docs.snippet: THIS summer the commercial airlines of the United States  will make the biggest and beat-planned effort in the history of aviation to fly the holiday-bound American between his home and the vacation spot of his choice.
docs.lead_paragraph: THIS summer the commercial airlines of the United States will make the biggest and beat-planned effort in the history of aviation to fly the holiday-bound American between his home and the vacation spot of his choice.

docs.snippet: LAKE SUCCESS, June 13--Contributions pledged today by eighteen countries to help the United Nations launch a world-wide program to raise living standards in economically backward regions brought the total to almost $18,000,000.
docs.lead_paragraph: LAKE SUCCESS, June 13--Contributions pledged today by eighteen countries to help the United Nations launch a world-wide program to raise living standards in economically backward regions brought the total to almost $18,000,000.
docs.abstract: 18 more countries pledge contributions to bring total to $18 million; list

headline.main: U.N. AID PLEDGES NEAR $18,000,000; l8 More Nations Agree to Help in the Program to Advance Backward Countries

byline.original: Special to THE NEW YORK TIMES

docs.snippet: LAKE SUCCESS, June 14--Late contributions and increased pledges came in a last-minute flurry today and pushed the United Nations conference that is raising funds for technical assistance over the goal --to $20,012,500.
docs.lead_paragraph: LAKE SUCCESS, June 14--Late contributions and increased pledges came in a last-minute flurry today and pushed the United Nations conference that is raising funds for technical assistance over the goal --to $20,012,500.
docs.abstract: new and late pledges push fund over goal to $20,012,500 total; new contributors listed; Santa Cruz invites USSR bloc to contribute in closing s

docs.snippet: Censorship, a disease that feeds on conflict and thrives in confusion, has gained increasing power over the free flow of information across frontiers in the last six months.
docs.lead_paragraph: Censorship, a disease that feeds on conflict and thrives in confusion, has gained increasing power over the free flow of information across frontiers in the last six months.
docs.abstract: AP world censorship survey for last 6 mos shows rise in curbs; easing in Middle East noted; ousters of Western newsmen from USSR bloc cited

headline.main: CENSORSHIP FOUND ON RISE IN WORLD; WENCESLAS SQUARE, THE BOULEVARD OF PRAGUE
